SOFA.name: BL001
SOFA.describe_en: Luxury is not the exclusive property of big houses, and taste is not limited by space. The JANE series of sofas is characterized by simple lines, slim outlines and elegant shapes. Even in limited space, they still look gentle and quiet, expressing the owner’s gracefulness and high-end life pursuits.Small sizes and exquisite shapes are suitable for modern living spaces.
SOFA.describe_cn: 奢华并非独属于大宅，品味并非受限于空间。BL001系列沙发，以简洁的线条、雅致的造型，即使在有限的空间里，也能娴静地延展、传达主人的优雅气度与生活追求。小巧的外形和尺寸，适合现代居室的空间需求。

SOFA.name: BL002
SOFA.describe_en: The series is characterized by comfort, simplicity and rich material options. The sofa covering combines leather and fabrics, which can freely matched according to specific likings. The exterior of the arms and backing cushions is made of steels plates covered with leather, while the interior is filled with down. As a result, the sofas are both fashionable and comfortable, rendering a combined feeling of hardness and softness. The wooden rim and metal feet of the bottom frame are all cut with the technique for gemstones, and the sofas look as vivid as sculptures.
SOFA.describe_cn: “留白”技巧完美演绎了BL002系列沙发“方寸之地亦显天地之宽”的意境，摈弃无意义的点缀，收获一份宽广的心境。舒适、简洁、面料选择丰富是该款沙发的主要特点。沙发外套采用真皮与面料结合的混搭风格，可随心搭配出独特的、专属于自己的沙发。扶手和靠垫外面采用钢板包上真皮做为支撑，里面用羽绒填充，刚柔并济，时尚且舒适。底框的实木边和金属腿均采用宝石般的切边设计，使沙发具有雕塑般的立体感。

SOFA.name: BL008
SOFA.describe_en: Leather or fabric upholstery. Solid birch frame with chrome-plated metal casting feet. Back cushions and pillows are filled with down. Multi-sectional combinations ways. Fabric covers are removable.
SOFA.describe_cn: 此款沙发脚为金属压铸镀铬工艺。有皮革和织物两种面套可供选择,织物面套可拆洗。腰垫、背垫为羽绒填充。

SOFA.name: BL017
SOFA.describe_en: Being distinctly angular but not intruding, JANE SLIM series is like a wise friend, broadening our outlook with neutral power.The hard and neutral appearance renders a more commercial experience. The buttoned integrated seat and back cushions are ideal for those who love a simple and high-tempo city life.
SOFA.describe_cn: 棱角分明却不张扬霸气，BL017系列沙发仿佛一位睿智的挚友，用中性的力量丰富和开阔了看世界的方式。硬朗、中性的外观造型，给人更加商务的使用体验。钉扣整坐垫、整体化靠垫是热爱简约、快节奏都市生活的现代人理想的选择。

SOFA.name: BL025
SOFA.describe_en: Being distinctly angular but not intruding, JANE SLIM series is like a wise friend, broadening our outlook with neutral power.The hard and neutral appearance renders a more commercial experience. The buttoned integrated seat and back cushions are ideal for those who love a simple and high-tempo city life.
SOFA.describe_cn: 棱角分明却不张扬霸气，BL025系列沙发仿佛一位睿智的挚友，用中性的力量丰富和开阔了看世界的方式。硬朗、中性的外观造型，给人更加商务的使用体验。钉扣整坐垫、整体化靠垫是热爱简约、快节奏都市生活的现代人理想的选择。

SOFA.name: BL026
SOFA.describe_en: The plump arched shape resembles a crescent. The classical grey and white color combination creates a tranquil gracefulness. The Neo-Classical tapered bed legs, as a combination of classical heritage and modern-style design elements, greatly add to the delicacy, loftiness and elegance of the product.By adopting the long narrow arms and back, the sofa can provide broader space for sitting and is more comfortable, especially in small rooms.   There are two kinds of depth for your choice, including 1030 and 930.
SOFA.describe_cn: 圆润的胖度弧线宛如一弯新月，白灰色的经典色彩搭配，充分体现了产品的宁静典雅之美。锥型腿的新古典设计，融合了现代风格的设计元素。窄长的扶手与靠背，提升了沙发的空间利用率，在小居室内可获得更宽大舒适的使用空间。按人体工程学设计的倾斜沙发后背，给予身体更体贴的支撑。共有1030和930两种进深沙发可供选择。

SOFA.name: BL030
SOFA.describe_en: Leather or fabric upholstery. Two armchairs in different sizes with compact armrests, five sizes of sofas in two kinds of depth, two kinds of corner sofas in two sizes each kind with left or right chaise longue and ottoman. Solid birch frame with high-resilient polyurethane foam and die-casting chrome-plated legs. Back cushions and pillows are filled with down.
SOFA.describe_cn: 此款沙发为实木框架。沙发脚为特制模压锌合金工艺，采用镀铬处理，具有微调功能。面套为双明线针绑处理，有皮革和织物两种面套可供选择。座垫为内置多种回弹力组合的海绵，以保证柔软舒适。腰、背垫采用羽绒填充。设计有宽扶手、中扶手和窄扶手三种形式，四种座深。

SOFA.name: BL032
SOFA.describe_en: Removable fabric covers. Five sizes of sofas and corner sofa with left or right chaise longue. Solid birch frame. Seat and back cushions and pillows are filled with down. Feet in metal covered with leather, matching coffee table with leather cover also available.
SOFA.describe_cn: 此款沙发为实木框架。座垫、背垫、腰垫采用羽绒填充。金属脚表面覆以真皮包裹,可搭配真皮茶几。织物面套，可拆洗。

SOFA.name: BL037
SOFA.describe_en: Two sizes in depth with multi-lengths, multiple combinations. Big back cushion with round pillow, more comfortable.
SOFA.describe_cn: 此款沙发为实木框架。面套为可拆洗的织物面套。座垫和背垫内填充多种回弹力的海绵及羽绒,以保证柔软舒适。羽绒填充的大背垫后挂式圆枕设计,具有调整倾斜角度功能。此款沙发有2种坐深和28个规格供选择。

CHAIR.name: BL013
CHAIR.describe_en: The LY003 series is inspired in the designer’s reflections on the “beautiful life” and sentimental attachment to the ethereality of dancing in the wind.The pendent wooden arms, which extend like willow leaves in the wind, are set in an interesting contrast with the comfortable sitting part of the sofa. The product is a perfect combination of naturalism and detailed elegance, integrating the comfort of small sofas and the ingenious structure of chairs. Moreover, the different footrest options can create variable home atmospheres.
CHAIR.describe_cn: BL013系列灵感源于设计师对“生活之美”的回味，对随风起舞的飘逸的眷恋。悬空的实木扶手如风中的柳叶般舒展开来，与厚实舒适的坐感相映成趣。该产品集合了小沙发的舒适坐感和椅子的精巧造型，是自然主义与典雅细节的完美结合。可搭配不同的脚踏，营造出变幻别样的家居氛围。

CHAIR.name: EyrieChair
CHAIR.describe_en: The Flora Series Chairs, made of solid wood, boast simple and elegant structure. The name “Flora”, which implicates that each of the chairs consists of two triangle elements from the perspective of Chinese character configuration, demonstrates unique cultural connotation. The leisure chair with soft foam cushions are stable and comfortable, while the dining chair and office chair with thin cushions are quite delicate and handy.
CHAIR.describe_cn: 实木结构的座椅造型简洁优雅，以“丛”为名，是从构字学的角度暗示每把椅子包含了两个三角形的元素，彰显了独特的文化内涵。搭配海绵坐靠垫的休闲椅稳重舒适，轻薄坐靠垫的餐椅、书椅轻巧灵活。

CHAIR.name: Y005
CHAIR.describe_en: Solid wood frame with seat and back upholstered. A cover can be upholstered on chair. Model 03 can be also used as an occasional chair or desk chair.
CHAIR.describe_cn: 实木框架结构，坐、背表面采用皮革或织物两种面套，同时可选配能拆洗的织物面套，此椅子03款还可作为配椅和书房椅使用。

CHAIR.name: Y011
CHAIR.describe_en: Leather or fabric upholstery. Leg in polished stainless steel. Match with dining table model EDGE and ARTINA.
CHAIR.describe_cn: 此款餐椅座背采用人体仿形设计，压模钢板制成。椅腿采用不锈钢，并经抛光处理。有皮革和织物两种面套材质可供选择。可搭配EDGE型号餐桌和ARTINA型号餐桌使用，也可单独作为配椅使用。

OCCASIONAL.name: D014
OCCASIONAL.describe_en: The succinct angled lines will remind you of solemn architecture displaying both gravity and passion of design. It has both decorative and practical functions matching the JANE Series.The small dimensions meet modern home space requirements. The angled shape can support large storage space.
OCCASIONAL.describe_cn: 简洁利落的折角线条，如同沉静肃穆的建筑。与D014系列沙发配合在一起，装饰功能和使用功能兼备。小巧的外形和尺寸，适合现代居室的空间需求。折角具有较强收纳功能。

OCCASIONAL.name: G007
OCCASIONAL.describe_en: The G007 series is the designer’s salutation to the simple style. The combination of metal cross legs and wooden tops represent the changing moods of home life.The sloping rim of the tray-like tabletop matches the cross oblate steel legs, thus eliminating the visual massiveness. It can be used as side table, end table or night table according to your needs.
OCCASIONAL.describe_cn: G007系列产品是设计师向简约混搭风格的致敬，金属叉腿和实木面板的混搭结合，演绎了家居生活的百变风情。托盘式桌面边缘斜边的设计呼应交叉的扁钢腿型，减少了视觉厚重感，具有小巧和多用途的特点。根据室内的不同需要，可用作边几、床头柜和背桌。

OCCASIONAL.name: G009
OCCASIONAL.describe_en: Inspired by the Chinese old type wooden-frame windows, the series add modern coloring conception to the classical elements. The perfect combination of illusion and practicability, together with the contrast between faces and lines, bring us an aesthetic feel of Constructivism.The series breaks the traditional tea table shapes with an utter application of square elements, rendering fresh and variable visual and practical experiences.  It has multiple flexible functions. It can be used alone, or match the sofas with variable shapes to display different sides.
OCCASIONAL.describe_cn: 该系列产品灵感来源于中国老式木框窗户，在古典元素中加入现代配色理念，虚实结合，面与线的对比带给我们一种构成主义的美感。将方的元素运用到底，给人以新鲜和多变的视觉及使用体验 ，框架包裹板材的设计，形成凸凹有致的立面。可单独使用，也可组合陈列以不同的姿态配合沙发摆放。

OCCASIONAL.name: G020
OCCASIONAL.describe_en: If we say the Clouds Series Sofas are like the soft clouds in the sky, then the Clouds Series Tea Tables are just like the beautiful aura around the clouds.The four angles of the tabletop are rounded off, the side of it is cambered, and the table top is covered with leather. All of these indicate the designer’s safety consideration. Since its ingeniously designed slim metal legs can be easily inserted under the sofa, the tea table can save space, and can be flexibly located in your living room as you like.
OCCASIONAL.describe_cn: 如果说云端沙发给人的感觉如同天空中柔软的云朵，那云端茶几就恰似云边美丽的虹彩，两者自由组合，相得益彰。云端茶几为沙发专门设计，茶几面四周倒圆角，桌面包皮，每一处都体现安全设计的理念。金属设计的腿部可以使茶几自由插入沙发底座，不仅节省空间，使用方式也更加随意。

OCCASIONAL.name: J001
OCCASIONAL.describe_en: If we say the Clouds Series Sofas are like the soft clouds in the sky, then the Clouds Series Tea Tables are just like the beautiful aura around the clouds.The four angles of the tabletop are rounded off, the side of it is cambered, and the table top is covered with leather. All of these indicate the designer’s safety consideration. Since its ingeniously designed slim metal legs can be easily inserted under the sofa, the tea table can save space, and can be flexibly located in your living room as you like.

OCCASIONAL.name: J005
OCCASIONAL.describe_en: If we say the Clouds Series Sofas are like the soft clouds in the sky, then the Clouds Series Tea Tables are just like the beautiful aura around the clouds.The four angles of the tabletop are rounded off, the side of it is cambered, and the table top is covered with leather. All of these indicate the designer’s safety consideration. Since its ingeniously designed slim metal legs can be easily inserted under the sofa, the tea table can save space, and can be flexibly located in your living room as you like.

OCCASIONAL.name: J008
OCCASIONAL.describe_en: If we say the Clouds Series Sofas are like the soft clouds in the sky, then the Clouds Series Tea Tables are just like the beautiful aura around the clouds.The four angles of the tabletop are rounded off, the side of it is cambered, and the table top is covered with leather. All of these indicate the designer’s safety consideration. Since its ingeniously designed slim metal legs can be easily inserted under the sofa, the tea table can save space, and can be flexibly located in your living room as you like.

OCCASIONAL.name: J009
OCCASIONAL.describe_en: If we say the Clouds Series Sofas are like the soft clouds in the sky, then the Clouds Series Tea Tables are just like the beautiful aura around the clouds.The four angles of the tabletop are rounded off, the side of it is cambered, and the table top is covered with leather. All of these indicate the designer’s safety consideration. Since its ingeniously designed slim metal legs can be easily inserted under the sofa, the tea table can save space, and can be flexibly located in your living room as you like.

OCCASIONAL.name: J013
OCCASIONAL.describe_en: If we say the Clouds Series Sofas are like the soft clouds in the sky, then the Clouds Series Tea Tables are just like the beautiful aura around the clouds.The four angles of the tabletop are rounded off, the side of it is cambered, and the table top is covered with leather. All of these indicate the designer’s safety consideration. Since its ingeniously designed slim metal legs can be easily inserted under the sofa, the tea table can save space, and can be flexibly located in your living room as you like.

OCCASIONAL.name: J015
OCCASIONAL.describe_en: If we say the Clouds Series Sofas are like the soft clouds in the sky, then the Clouds Series Tea Tables are just like the beautiful aura around the clouds.The four angles of the tabletop are rounded off, the side of it is cambered, and the table top is covered with leather. All of these indicate the designer’s safety consideration. Since its ingeniously designed slim metal legs can be easily inserted under the sofa, the tea table can save space, and can be flexibly located in your living room as you like.

OCCASIONAL.name: J025
OCCASIONAL.describe_en: If we say the Clouds Series Sofas are like the soft clouds in the sky, then the Clouds Series Tea Tables are just like the beautiful aura around the clouds.The four angles of the tabletop are rounded off, the side of it is cambered, and the table top is covered with leather. All of these indicate the designer’s safety consideration. Since its ingeniously designed slim metal legs can be easily inserted under the sofa, the tea table can save space, and can be flexibly located in your living room as you like.

TABLE.name: BLC004
TABLE.describe_en: The Series is characterized by the rounded table top lines and hard and lofty legs. The seemingly contrastive roundedness and angles are now perfectly combined with the designer’s deep reflections on life.The series show consideration for humanism. The non-angular smooth tabletop rim looks safe, soft and amiable.  The asymmetrical right-angled and trapezoid  legs can give you different visual experiences from different perspectives. It can be used as a dining table, study desk or dressing table.
TABLE.describe_cn: 圆滑的桌面曲线、硬朗的桌腿轮廓，看似对立的圆滑与棱角，却因设计师对生活的深度思考与包容而完美地融合在一起。该系列充分体现了人性化设计理念。没有尖锐棱角、桌面边缘圆滑的曲线设计，给人安全、柔和、亲切的感觉。随着观看角度的变化，不对称的直角梯形桌腿设计可带来不同的视觉体验。可作为餐桌、书桌和梳妆台的选择。

TABLE.name: C004
TABLE.describe_en: The Vessel Series stems from the designer’s vision of a beautiful scene of a delicate boat floating on the lake. The simple and smooth outlines, together with the exquisite leg structure, fully demonstrate the refreshing natural beauty of this series. It is a smart choice for modern-style rooms.
TABLE.describe_cn: 源自对一叶轻舟泛波湖上的美好向往，设计师创作了该系列。简洁流畅的外观线条、精巧优美的桌腿设计，充分体现了该系列清新简约的自然之美，成为现代风格居室的品位之选。

TABLE.name: C006
TABLE.describe_en: The VERGE series fully displays CAMERICH’s simple and modern design styles.The product strictly adheres to the principle of “removing complexity”. The facets in different directions and at different angles of the tabletop, legs and drawers imbue the product with futurism. It can be used as a dining table or study desk.
TABLE.describe_cn: C006系列产品现代简约的产品设计风格发挥到了极致。该产品将“剔除一切繁复”进行到底，桌面、桌腿、抽屉等不同方向和角度的切面，让产品充满了未来感。可用作餐桌或书桌。

TABLE.name: S001
TABLE.describe_en: Console with finish in grey oak. Assembled black-lacquered steel frame.
TABLE.describe_cn: 桌面采用橡木贴皮。桌腿为特制钢板喷塑处理。此款产品可作为玄关使用。

BED.name: Q001
BED.describe_en: The plump arched shape resembles a crescent. The classical grey and white color combination creates a tranquil gracefulness. The Neo-Classical tapered bed legs, as a combination of classical heritage and modern-style design elements, greatly add to the delicacy, loftiness and elegance of the product.The high headboard is suitable for mattresses of different thicknesses. The slanting surface can provide a more comfortable support for your body.
BED.describe_cn: 圆润的胖度弧线宛如一弯新月，白灰色的经典色彩搭配，充分体现了产品的宁静典雅之美。锥型腿的新古典设计，融合了现代风格的设计元素。高靠背的设计适用于不同厚度的床垫，倾斜的床头设计，提供更舒服的睡前支撑。

BED.name: Q002
BED.describe_en: A new item in the family of 3006. Solid wood fram and zinc alloy feet. Mattress size:200cm x 180cm.
BED.describe_cn: 此款床与沙发3006型号产品属于同系列。实木框架，床脚为锌合金模铸成型表面镀铬处理。床塌有裙边面套选择。搭配200厘米x1800厘米床垫使用。

BED.name: Q003
BED.describe_en: The design of the Screen Series Beds was inspired by the Chinese classical furniture – the screen. With the simplest outlines, they display the unique Chinese elegance and introversion.There are two options for this Series. One is the Screen-Type Bed. It has two additional screens with the headboard, which can be easily rotated to meet with different requirements for space privacy, and can also serve for partition and decoration. The other is the Single-Headboard Type Bed. With extremely simple outlines, it looks graceful and elegant, and can match different styles of space.
BED.describe_cn: Q003 床，用最简练的线条设计，诠释中国式的优雅，表达出含蓄内敛的态度。这款床有双重选择。屏风款附加可自由转动的侧页，闭合随意，构成卧室的私密空间，同时也有极强的隔断和装饰作用。单背款典雅大方，极简的线条善于融入不同的设计空间。

BED.name: Q005
BED.describe_en: Metal frame in leather or fabric cover. Mattress size: 180cm x 200cm.
BED.describe_cn: 此款产品的比例尽显高贵，在床头和床尾的两侧拉练的运用充满设计的匠心。金属框架。有二款垫子可以选配。可以搭配两个90厘米×200厘米床垫或一个180厘米×200厘米床垫。

BED.name: Q010
BED.describe_en: Metal frame in leather or fabric cover. Mattress size: 180cm x 200cm.
BED.describe_cn: 此款产品的比例尽显高贵，在床头和床尾的两侧拉练的运用充满设计的匠心。

BED.name: Q011
BED.describe_en: Metal frame in leather or fabric cover. Mattress size: 180cm x 200cm.
BED.describe_cn: 此款产品的比例尽显高贵，在床头和床尾的两侧拉练的运用充满设计的匠心。

BED.name: Q012
BED.describe_en: Metal frame in leather or fabric cover. Mattress size: 180cm x 200cm.
BED.describe_cn: 此款产品的比例尽显高贵，在床头和床尾的两侧拉练的运用充满设计的匠心。

BED.name: Q013
BED.describe_en: Metal frame in leather or fabric cover. Mattress size: 180cm x 200cm.
BED.describe_cn: 此款产品的比例尽显高贵，在床头和床尾的两侧拉练的运用充满设计的匠心。

CABINET.name: B001
CABINET.describe_en: The series focus on the use and storage of small household appliances. The multi-functional locker can conceal the operating table or appliances inside the cabinet, combining the functionality and privacy of a cabinet. With the tradition-breaking sliding door design, together with the different inner and outer colors and materials, the originally low-profile and simple design just looks rich and lively. The product can be used as a sideboard or hall cabinet.
CABINET.describe_cn: 在轻松写意地滑动中，开启不一样的空间，切换不一样的心绪，这是“B001”系列柜体所表达的家居生活的精彩与丰富。该系列产品着眼于解决小家电在家中的摆放及使用问题。多功能储物柜可将操作台或家电隐藏于柜体中，兼具柜子的功能性及私密性。突破传统的全滑动移门设计配以内外不同的色彩材质肌理，让原本低调简洁的外型凸显出层叠错落的丰富和活泼。此产品可根据不同需要用作餐边柜、厅柜等。

CABINET.name: B002
CABINET.describe_en: The Solo Series have two choices, i.e. Single Cabinet and Combined Cabinet. The three-dimensional design of the doors of the Combined Cabinet, which breaks through the traditional planar design, stretches the spatial lines and increases the modern feel of the cabinet.The exquisite and practical interior compartments show the designer’s full consideration for the user’s needs, imbue the product with richer contents and create a feel of nobility from inside.
CABINET.describe_cn: 该系列有单件柜和组合柜两种设计。单件柜独立摆放，超群出众，宛如一枝独秀绽放在家的某个角落。三维展开的组合柜柜门设计、突破传统的平面展开格式，拉伸了空间线条，增强了立体感。精致实用的内部功能分区，充分考虑用户的使用需求。表面黑色镀镍的定制连接件美观精巧，细节处流露出优雅尊贵的品质感。

CABINET.name: D008
CABINET.describe_en: The units in this series can be used individually or in combination to make a TV stand, sideboard, shoes cabinet, bedside table, bookcase, or simply a functional cabinet. Finish in oak veneer, and steel feet in black powder coating.
CABINET.describe_cn: 此系列由单元模块组合演变成电视柜，餐边柜，鞋柜，床头柜，卧室柜，书柜，展示架等多功能柜体。表面采用橡木贴皮。柜脚为特制钢板经喷塑处理。

CABINET.name: G004
CABINET.describe_en: The STILTS Series is inspired by the designer’s respect for the modern industrialization and love for traditional furniture.The side three-dimensional frame structure breaks the dull traditional plane framework. The hard outlines, together with the heightened metal legs, make the product looks quite lofty and succinct. The product has multiple functions, such as book cabinet, drinks cabinet, sideboard, shoe cabinet or locker, etc.
CABINET.describe_cn: LG004产品设计理念来源于设计师对现代工业的尊重以及对传统家具的眷恋。侧面立体框架结构，突破了传统柜体平面框架的呆板。硬朗的框架线条配合挑高的金属地脚，产品重心上移的同时，通透感及层次高增强。该产品使用功能丰富，可用作书柜、酒柜、餐边柜、鞋柜、储物柜。

CABINET.name: G007
CABINET.describe_en: The broad and stable cabinet outlook demonstrates the modular concept of containment capability and boundlessness. The matching two colors of Grey Oak Bark and Baking Varnish imbues the product with liveliness.The width of the cabinet can be customized to meet with different space sizes. The independent drawer boxes add to the storage function of the cabinet, which can be selected and moved according to specific needs.
CABINET.describe_cn: 宽阔大气的柜体体现了宽厚包容、无限延伸的模数概念，灰橡木皮和烤漆的双色搭配使该产品在稳重沉静中不失活泼的变化。此系列柜体适应于不同尺度的空间。独立的抽屉盒子增加了柜体的储物功能，抽屉盒子可根据需要选配和移动，极大地满足了每个用户的不同使用需要。
